statements: SELECT * FROM Reservations;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date, party_size FROM Reservations WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian';
SELECT table_number, customer_name, reservation_time FROM Reservations WHERE party_size >= 4;
SELECT reservation_id, cuisine_type, special_requests FROM Reservations WHERE reservation_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Reservations WHERE party_size = 2 ORDER BY reservation_date DESC, reservation_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Reservations ORDER BY reservation_date DESC, reservation_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, party_size FROM Reservations WHERE cuisine_type = 'Italian' ORDER BY reservation_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date, reservation_time, table_number FROM Reservations WHERE party_size >= 5 AND cuisine_type = 'Mexican';
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, reservation_date, reservation_time, party_size FROM Reservations WHERE special_requests IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(special_requests) > 10;
SELECT * FROM Reservations WHERE reservation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY reservation_date, reservation_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Reservations WHERE customer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, table_number, reservation_date FROM Reservations WHERE table_number = 5;
SELECT * FROM Reservations WHERE reservation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, table_number FROM Reservations WHERE table_number IN (1, 3, 5);

SELECT customer_name, reservation_date, table_location FROM Reservations JOIN SeatingArrangements ON Reservations.table_number = SeatingArrangements.table_number WHERE SeatingArrangements.cuisine_type = 'Italian';
SELECT customer_name, table_number, reservation_date FROM Reservations WHERE reservation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Reservations WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;

SELECT customer_name, table_location, cuisine_type FROM Reservations JOIN SeatingArrangements ON Reservations.table_number = SeatingArrangements.table_number WHERE SeatingArrangements.cuisine_type = 'Italian';
SELECT customer_name, table_number, reservation_date FROM Reservations WHERE customer_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie') AND table_number BETWEEN 1 AND 5;

SELECT customer_name, table_size, table_location FROM Reservations JOIN SeatingArrangements ON Reservations.table_number = SeatingArrangements.table_number ORDER BY table_size DESC, table_location ASC;
SELECT * FROM reservations;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date FROM reservations ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT cuisine_name, country_of_origin FROM cuisines WHERE country_of_origin = 'Italy';
SELECT table_name, capacity, location FROM seating_arrangements WHERE location = 'Outdoor' ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, reservation_date, reservation_time FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT reservation_id, customer_name, reservation_date FROM reservations WHERE reservation_time > '18:00';
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date, reservation_time FROM reservations WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT table_name, capacity, location FROM seating_arrangements WHERE capacity >= 4 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT cuisine_name, country_of_origin FROM cuisines WHERE cuisine_name LIKE 'Italian%' ORDER BY country_of_origin DESC;
SELECT * FROM Reservations;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date, reservation_time FROM Reservations WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT reservation_date, reservation_time, table_number FROM Reservations WHERE reservation_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT reservation_date, reservation_time FROM Reservations WHERE table_number = 4 AND reservation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT c.customer_name, t.location FROM Customers c JOIN Tables t ON c.customer_id = t.table_id WHERE t.seating_capacity >= 4;
SELECT * FROM Reservations ORDER BY reservation_date DESC, reservation_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM reservations;
SELECT customer_name, num_guests, reservation_date, reservation_time FROM reservations;
SELECT item_name, item_price, cuisine_type FROM menu_items JOIN cuisines ON menu_items.cuisine_id = cuisines.cuisine_id;
SELECT customer_name, num_guests, reservation_date, reservation_time FROM reservations WHERE reservation_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT item_name, item_price, item_description FROM menu_items WHERE item_price <= 10.00;
SELECT * FROM reservations;
SELECT customer_name, reservation_date, num_guests FROM reservations ORDER BY reservation_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_description, item_price FROM menu_items WHERE cuisine_id = 2;
SELECT reservation_id, reservation_date, num_guests FROM reservations WHERE num_guests >= 5 ORDER BY reservation_date ASC;

SELECT o.order_id, r.customer_name, m.item_name, o.quantity FROM orders o JOIN reservations r ON o.reservation_id = r.reservation_id JOIN menu_items m ON o.item_id = m.item_id ORDER BY o.order_time DESC;
